msbt.message: So you're thinking about leaving , hm? I see, I seeWell, I'm afraid it doesn't quite work like that, since you're our Resident Representative. That said
I can help you move the entirety of to a different Nintendo Switch system.If that is something that interests you at this time. However, I cannot help you with that process here.
I understand.
Where can I do that?

So you're thinking about leaving , hm? I see, I seeWell, I'm afraid that, because you're our Resident Representative, I can't help you leave .But, if you like, I can help move the entire island of to another Nintendo Switch system.

Now, although I can't help you move yourself to a different island, maybe you want to move someone else?If you want to begin the moving process on behalf of another player on this island, I'd be glad to help.

Please note that I can only move players who currently own a house on this island.Oh! And I can't move players who are linked to a user account on this Nintendo Switch system.If you'd like to begin the moving process for another player, please ask me to "Move another resident."
So, with that out of the way How can I meet your moving needs, hm?
Move another resident.
I want more info.
How do I move my island?
Never mind.
I'm relieved to hear that!<10_4 /> In that case, let's get you back to the title screen, hm?I hope you continue enjoying life on !

Very well, I'll explain. First, download the Island Transfer Tool from Nintendo eShop on both systems.The Island Transfer Tool will take you through the process of moving your island to a different system.If you go through with it, all of your island data on this system will be deleted, of course.Detailed info on the moving process can also be found on the Nintendo Support website if you need it.
For now, all I am able to do is point you in the right direction. I hope that's helpful, !
I understand.
Explain that again.
Of course! Let me walk you through moving a player. Remember, they must not be linked to a user account.Also, please keep in mind that I cannot help you move this island's Resident Representative.
Of course! Let me walk you through moving a player. Remember, they must not be linked to a user account.
The first step is to select which player will be moving to a different Nintendo Switch system.
And are you absolutely sure that wants to move?
Yes, that is correct.
Choose another resident.
Stop the moving process.
Understood, understood! One moment while I make sure that can move.

Yes, yes! Everything appears to be in order.Now, before we start the moving process, we need to go over some very important information.Even if you aren't the one moving, this is still important to hear.

I hate to be the bearer of bad news, butright now, can't move to a new system.You see, I can't move someone until they have their own house on .Sadly, for now we'll need to cancel the moving process. Please send my apologies to , hm?

Of course, of course. One moment Oh! Um Unfortunately, there aren't any players I can move off the island.You see, there are a few conditions that must be met in order for me to help someone move.First, the player cannot be the island's Resident Representative. Second, they must own a house.And third, the player's data must not be linked to a user account on this Nintendo Switch system.Once a player has met all three conditions, I'll be happy to begin the moving process for them.
Yes, yes, there's nothing we need to do right now.Oh! And I'm sorry to ask this, but I'll need you to close the game. I hope you continue to enjoy island life!
So you're thinking about leaving , hm? I see, I seeIf you're sure about moving off this island and Nintendo Switch system, say, "Move me off the island."
I can also help you begin the moving process on behalf of another player.

Please note that I can only move players who currently own a house on this island.Also, I can't move this island's Resident Representative. They're too important to the community.Oh! And I can't move players who are linked to a user account on this Nintendo Switch system.If you'd like to begin the moving process for another player, please ask me to "Move another resident."
So, with that out of the way How can I meet your moving needs, hm?
Move me off the island.
Move another resident.
I want more info.
Never mind.
You want to move to another island? I know everyone will miss you, but I support you on this new adventure!
I just want to confirm You wish to move to a different island on another Nintendo Switch system, correct?
Yes, that is correct.
I've changed my mind.
OK! There are several important things you'll need to know before leaving .

When someone moves, they bring the items in their pockets, their home, and the furniture inside that home.They also bring the Bells in their bank account, the contents of their mailbox, and their shop catalog.However, they cannot take items that don't belong to them, such as items they're holding for their neighbors.

After they move, they'll still be able to use their current NookPhone and all the apps installed on it.Althoughwe should have a chat about the custom designs saved in one's Custom Designs app.Moving to someone else's island will cause all designs to be overwritten with those of the new home.Please keep that in mind if anyone is moving to a populated island!
Oh! And it may give players peace of mind to know they can keep using their NookPhone and their apps!

One last thing we should discussIt's about features that use the internet, like the Best Friends List and the Custom Designs Portal.If the mover won't be using the same Nintendo Account they're using now after they arrive on the new systemall data related to those features will be deleted, so please keep that in mind before someone moves.
Yes, yes, I believe that covers everything. Are you ready to start the moving process now?
Yes, I'm ready!
Explain that again.
Actually, never mind.

Understood. In that case, I want you to listen VERY closely to how the moving process works!You'll need another Nintendo Switch system in addition to the one you're using now. It will be your new home.You'll also need a second copy of the game to use with the other system.Launch the Animal Crossing: New Horizons game on the second system.When you launch the game on the second system, pick the user you'll use to play as .

Understood. In that case, I want you to listen VERY closely to how the moving process works!You'll need another Nintendo Switch system in addition to this one. It will be 's new home.You'll also need a second copy of the game to use with the other system.Launch the Animal Crossing: New Horizons game on the second system.When launching the game on the second system, pick the user that will be playing as .
Once the game launches, it will begin at the check-in counter.Please tell whoever is working the counter, "I'm moving."
After that, follow the instructions on both screens to continue with the moving process!Now then, are you ready to begin searching for the second system by sending a Transfer Request?
Yes, I'm ready!
Explain that again.
Actually, never mind.
It seems 's system is ready to accept someone.
Yes, yes! It appears we can continue the process of moving a player to 's system.
It looks like someone can move over to , which is on 's system!Shall we continue with moving a player to ?
Let's do it!
Actually, never mind.
Thank you so much for being patient. Everything is ready!I'm sure you'll have lots of fun at your new home. Do take care, hm, ?
Thank you for being patient. It appears everything is ready for 's big move!Please wish the best on their new adventure!
It seems 's system is ready to accept someone.
It looks like someone can move over to , which is on 's system!However
Yes, yes! Excellent. Now, there is one more thing we need to discuss
The Nintendo Account used on the other system is not the same as the one you're using now
The user on the other system doesn't appear to be using a Nintendo Account

If you continue with the move, all features that use the internet, like the Best Friends List, will be reset.I just want to make sure that you understand that, hm?Moving to a system that's not linked to the same Nintendo Account will be a bit like starting over in some ways.
After hearing that, do you still want to move someone over to 's system?
Let's do it!
Actually, never mind.
After hearing that, do you still want to move someone to ?
Let's do it!
Actually, never mind.
The Nintendo Account in use on the other system isn't the same as the one uses
The user on the target system isn't linked to a Nintendo Account.And yet, a Nintendo Account is linked to here
That means that all features that use the internet, like their Best Friends List, will be reset if they move.

Understood! We'll stop here.If someone plans to use their data from features which use the internet after they move between systemsthat person's user accounts on both systems must be linked to the same Nintendo Account.Once that's done, you can restart the process with me.
For now, let's go back to the title screen, shall we?
Oh! And I'm sorry to ask this, but I'll need you to close the game.
Hm? Do you still want to go through with the moving process?
Let's do it!
Actually, never mind.
I couldn't find a Nintendo Switch system that is accepting anyone Would you like me to try again?
Try searching again.
Never mind.
Yes, yes, we don't need to do anything right now.<10_4 /> In that case, let's return you to the title screen.I hope you continue to enjoy life on !
Hm? It seems we've run into some connection trouble. I'm sorry, but for now let's go back to the title screen.
Hm? We've run into some connection trouble. I'm sorry, but I'll need you to close the game and start over.
I appreciate you giving this ample thought. It's a big decision. For now, let's go back to the title screen. I hope you continue to enjoy life on .
You want to move to another island? I see, I seeI really wish I could help you, but I'm afraid I can't.You see, in order to start the moving process, you need to own a house on first.
I understand.
Well, alright...
Thank you for understanding.I'll send you back to the title screen for now. I hope you continue to enjoy your life on !
Of course, of course! What would you like to know about moving to a different island?
Moving to a new island?
What do I need to have?
What are the conditions?
I think I'm good.
Yes, yes, I believe that covers that. Anything else you want to know?
Moving to a new island?
What do I need to have?
What are the conditions?
Nothing else, I'm good!
Of course, of course! What would you like to know about moving to a different island?
Moving to a new island?
What do I need to have?
What are the conditions?
Can I move my user account?
I think I'm good.
Yes, yes, I believe that covers that. Anything else you want to know?
Moving to a new island?
What do I need to have?
What are the conditions?
Can I move my user account?
Nothing else, I'm good!

Yes! A single player can choose to move to a different island on a different Nintendo Switch system.If the destination lacks save data for the Animal Crossing: New Horizons game, they'll arrive at a new island.However, if there is save data on the target system, the player can move to the existing island on that system.Now, there are two ways to move. The first is when the player wanting to move speaks with me directly.The other option is for cases where the player is no longer linked with a user account on the system.In that case, a different player from that island can speak with me and begin the move on their behalf.

Moving to a different island requires a separate Nintendo Switch system from the one you are using now.You'll also need a second copy of the Animal Crossing: New Horizons game running on that other system.Part of the process also involves using a local wireless connection.Make sure you have both systems, both copies of the game, and a local wireless connection before you start.

There are a few conditions that need to be met in order to move.Players who don't have their own house, or are the island's Resident Representative, cannot move.There is also an important condition if you are trying to start the moving process on behalf of another playerThe player who is moving must not be linked to a user account on this Nintendo Switch system.Please keep all of these conditions in mind when considering a move, hm?

Indeed! To do this, you'll need to use the Transfer Your User Data option on this system as part of your move.First, in system settings, use the Transfer Your User Data option to move the user to the target system.Then, on the target system, launch the Animal Crossing: New Horizons game using the transferred user.Next, begin the moving process on the target system.Last, since the user data moved, ask another player to start this system's moving process on your behalf.
